sprykerComponent.name: toggler-hash
sprykerComponent.readme:
Provides functionality to add/remove class to/from an array of DOM-elements if browser address input field includes or doesn't include the same hash as in a component.

Code sample

{% include molecule('toggler-hash') with {
    attributes: {
        'trigger-hash': 'trigger-hash',
        'target-selector': 'target-selector',
        'class-to-toggle': 'class-to-toggle',
        'add-class-when-hash-in-url': false
    }
} only %}

defines.name: attributes

methods.name: checkHash
methods.description: Checks the hash and triggers the flexible toggle action.

parameters.name: addClass
parameters.description: A boolean value for a more flexible toggling action.
